item.description:
Boston Harbor Singles Cruise
Leaves from Rowes Wharf
Bon Voyage Party 5-7pm
Cruise and Dance 7-10pm

What time to meet there to be determined at a later date.

Early Bird Tickets on sale until May 31st are only $30.00
And 4 for $100.00
Prices for June $35.00
Prices for July $45.00
Mail Your Check To:Singles Network 6 Deerfield Road, Hingham Ma, 02043
If you wish to charge your tickets call (781) 283-0400
Leave your name, day and eve. phone number, and best time to reach you.
You may also email question to singlesexec222@comcast.net

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Boston Harbor Singles Cruise
